name: nuzlocke-tracker
description: A tool for tracking PokÃ©mon encounters and captures during Nuzlocke challenges

scripts.minify: npm run terser && npm run cleancss
scripts.terser: terser src/js/jquery.js src/js/fomantic.js src/js/locations.js src/js/pokemon.js src/js/plugins.js src/js/main.js -o dist/js/main.min.js && terser src/js/serviceworker.js -o serviceworker.js
scripts.cleancss: cleancss -o dist/css/main.min.css -O2 all:on src/css/fomantic.css src/css/main.css src/css/sprites.css

author: Ashenfactory
